name: AWS API Gateway
description: The Sumo Logic App for AWS API Gateway provides visibility into your Amazon APIGateway Service Metrics collected via a CloudWatch Metrics Source. The App’s Dashboards provide preconfigured searches and filters that allow you to monitor your API Gateway Infrastructure.

children.name: 1. AWS API Gateway - Latency, Cache
children.description: AWS API Gateway - Latency, Cache dashboard provides insights into API Gateway performance including API requests, latency, API cache hits, and back-end cache misses.
children.title: 1. AWS API Gateway - Latency, Cache

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account | timeshift 1d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account | timeshift 7d

panels.title: Latency
panels.text: Time in between API Gateway receives request from client and returns response to the client

panels.title: ‎Integration Latency
panels.text: Time in between API Gateway relays request to backend and receives response from backend

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Latency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=IntegrationLatency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=CacheHitCount statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account | eval _value * 100
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=CacheMissCount statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account | eval _value * 100

panels.title: Requests Served From API Cache (Cache Hits)

children.name: 1. AWS API Gateway - Overview
children.description: AWS API Gateway - Overview dashboard provides insights into API Gateway performance throughout your infrastructure, including API calls, latency, client and server-side errors, API cache hits, and back-end cache misses.
children.title: 1. AWS API Gateway - Overview

panels.title: ‎Integration Latency
panels.text: Time in between API Gateway relays request to backend and receives response from backend

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Latency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=5XXError Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=IntegrationLatency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=CacheHitCount statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account | eval _value * 100
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=CacheMissCount statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account | eval _value * 100
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=4XXError Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account

panels.title: Requests Served From API Cache (Cache Hits)

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account | count
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by apiname | eval round(_value)
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Latency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=IntegrationLatency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by account, region, namespace
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by account, region, namespace | timeshift 1d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by account, region, namespace | timeshift 7d

children.name: 2. AWS API Gateway - 4XX and 5XX Errors
children.description: AWS API Gateway - 4xx and 5xx Errors dashboard provides insights into API Gateway HTTP 4xx and 5xx code errors throughout your infrastructure, including API requests, client-side errors, and server-side errors.
children.title: 2. AWS API Gateway - 4XX and 5XX Errors

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=4XXError Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=5XXError Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account | timeshift 1d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account | timeshift 7d

children.name: 2. AWS API Gateway - Audit Events
children.description: AWS API Gateway - Audit Events dashboard provides detailed audit insights into API Gateway events by various dimensions including event names, trends, regions, user agents, and recipient account IDs.
children.title: 2. AWS API Gateway - Audit Events

queries.queryString:
"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" eventName account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| timeslice 15m
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, event_name
| transpose row _timeslice column event_name

"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" userAgent account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count as eventCount by user_agent
| sort by eventCount, user_agent asc

"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} sourceIPAddress
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com" and !(src_ip matches "*.amazonaws.com")  and !isEmpty(errorCode)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count by src_ip
| lookup latitude, longitude from geo://location on ip = src_ip
| where !isnull(latitude)

"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" !errorCode account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} sourceIPAddress
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com" and !(src_ip matches "*.amazonaws.com") and isEmpty(errorCode)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count by src_ip
| lookup latitude, longitude from geo://location on ip = src_ip
| where !isnull(latitude)

"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count as eventCount by eventStatus
| sort by eventCount, eventStatus asc

"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| timeslice 15m
| count by _timeslice, eventStatus
| fillmissing timeslice(15m), values ("Success", "Failure") in eventStatus
| transpose row _timeslice column eventStatus

"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com" and !isEmpty(errorCode)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count as eventCount by errorCode 
| top 10 errorCode by eventCount, errorCode asc

"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com" and !isEmpty(errorCode)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count as eventCount by event_name
| sort by eventCount, event_name asc

"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com" and !isEmpty(errorCode)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop 
| json field=responseElements "name", "Message" as ApiName, responseMessage nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| if (isEmpty(errorMessage), responseMessage, errorMessage) as errorMessage
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, event_name, errorCode, errorMessage, Region, src_ip, accountId, user, type, requestID, user_agent, apiname
| sort by _timeslice
| limit 100

"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" !errorCode account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| where eventStatus = "Success"
| count as eventCount by event_name
| sort by eventCount, event_name asc

"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" !errorCode account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| where eventStatus = "Success"
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, event_name, Region, src_ip, accountId, user, type, requestID, user_agent, ApiName
| sort by _timeslice
| limit 100

"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count as eventCount by type, user
| topk(10, eventCount) by type | fields -_rank

panels.title: Threat Table based on Caller IP Address

queries.queryString:
"\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage", "requestID" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage, requestID nodrop
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId2, arn, username, type nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, CreateApiKey, CreateUsagePlan, CreateUsagePlanKey, CreateUsagePlanKey, ImportApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi, UpdateUsagePlan provides ApiName
| where (tolowercase(ApiName) matches tolowercase("{{apiname}}")) or isBlank(apiname)
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count by src_ip, event_name // , user, user_agent, apiname
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=src_ip 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address" and malicious_confidence = "high"
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
| sort by _count
| fields src_ip, event_name, type, actor, malicious_confidence // , user, user_agent, apiname

children.name: 3. AWS API Gateway - Enhanced Monitoring
children.description: AWS API Gateway - Enhanced Monitoring dashboard provides detailed insights into API Gateway performance throughout your infrastructure, including the number and types of API calls, API resources, cache hits and misses, latency averages, and errors by HTTP method.
children.title: 3. AWS API Gateway - Enhanced Monitoring

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Count Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum by method
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=4XXError Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum by method
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=5XXError Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} stage={{stage}}  method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum by method
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum

Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account, method | count

Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum by apiname, namespace, region, account, resource | count

Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum by apiname, method, resource | eval round(_value)

Namespace={{namespace}} metric=CacheHitCount statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account | eval _value * 100

Namespace={{namespace}} metric=CacheMissCount statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account | eval _value * 100

Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Latency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account

Namespace={{namespace}} metric=IntegrationLatency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} apiname={{apiname}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | avg by apiname, namespace, region, account

panels.title: Note
panels.text: This dashboard works on detailed CloudWatch metrics which needs to be explicitly enabled. You can do this in the AWS console by selecting "Enable CloudWatch Metrics" under a stage Settings tab. Alternatively, you can call the update-stage AWS CLI command to update the metricsEnabled property to true.
